ðŸ“– Summary: Raycast for Linux is an open-source application launcher designed to bring the functionality of Raycast to Linux users. It offers features such as an extensible command palette, extension support, a powerful calculator, clipboard history, snippets, and AI integration, aiming to provide a streamlined and efficient way to interact with your system.
